name: Descent
description:
Phantom Series - No.9:

The Phantom series is a collection of pieces leading up to a short film I'm making, working title "Phantom".

The film is a stylized audio-visual journey depicting the evolution of a computer program achieving sentience, told in multiple acts.

Phantom no.9 explores the build up to the final act, utilizing fractal-like structures and complex overlapping geometric forms as a visual language. In this piece, the avatar resembling the computer program travels deep into the abyss of the machine, approaching the final door leading to an unknown location.

Visuals all made in a combination of Unity and Houdini with everything running in real-time. MIDI from the music is used to help procedurally build the environment

video | 1080 x 1080 | 30fps

Art and music: Daniel Sierra | @dbsierra4444


phantom, digital, procedural, audiovisual, 3D, realtime, animation, meditative
